channel.title: Highscores help
channel.description:
hello i created highscores and i can view them but if i use my server ip its just a blank page. how do make it where everyone can view them?
this is the tut i followed [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,413569.0.html]HighScores[/url]

item.title: Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay im use the addy

http://localhost/highscores/highscores.php

but when i do http://myserver-no-ip.biz/highscores/highscores.php

a blank page pops up.

i didnt get any compiling errors. so i dont know whats wrong

i believe im using the xampp to connect it.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores help
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m assuming you’re currently using localhost. You could setup XAMPP on your host and display them through your host IP. I’m sure the tutorial tells you how to do so?

Please be more specific. What do you use to connect? etc.

Read full topic
